idea: We are working on pollution caused by Post-Harvest Agro Residue Burning by converting the residue into briquettes to serve as fuel in Cremation Centres. To increase the efficiency of cremation, we proposed a Socially Acceptable Gasifier Based Pyre.
name: Nirvaan

idea:
About the company (“Essentially AI”):

• The venture is led by a combination of an ex-McKinsey and Company consultant with deep experience in big data analytics as well as turning around businesses in industrial sectors such as ports, mineral processing, and mining, as well as a formerly practicing Chartered Accountant with in-depth knowledge of internal processes, accounting, taxation and compliance regulations in India particularly in small and medium sized enterprise (SMEs) segment.


• We are looking to use Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) at scale to automate repetitive tasks carried by SMEs.


• Such an offering is not available in India today, and therefore has huge potential to optimise the way SMEs work across industries and functions


• The end state would be a software as a service offering that SMEs can get onboarded onto quickly and efficiently, and incorporate into their existing processes with minimal hassle and disruption


• We have $2m in initial funding raised to build out the venture.


• On the side we are also looking at predictive modelling techniques for varied use cases.
name: ESSENTIALLY AI PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Curotherm Techno Solutions LLP (CTS) is established with a vision to bring in proactive solutions in terms of technological advancement as well as cost benefit to the patient without compromising on quality, service and patient safety.

The firm is formed by experts in their field of manufacturing of electronic equipments, sales of capital goods in healthcare and in the field of financial management.

CTS brings in adequate and rich experience from consultants, physicians and designers from respective fields which form the epitome of a solid and strong foundation.

The firm believes in highest quality standards of medical equipment which are backed with equal high standards of after sales service.

CTS follows the best healthcare practices available with world class after sales service, equally complying with regulatory norms abiding to the law of the land where our equipments are installed.
name: CUROTHERM TECHNOSOLUTIONS LLP
